name: @flock-org/flock
description: Agent swarm orchestration plugin for openclaw â€” homes, leases, A2A communication, and governance

scripts.build: tsc && cp -r src/prompts/templates dist/prompts/ && cp openclaw.plugin.json dist/ && chmod +x dist/cli/index.js
scripts.postinstall: echo '\nğŸ¦ Run "flock init" to configure Flock in your OpenClaw setup.\n'
scripts.test: vitest run --project unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:integration: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm --build integration; docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down -v
scripts.test:e2e: docker compose -f docker-compose.e2e.yml up --build --abort-on-container-exit; docker compose -f docker-compose.e2e.yml down -v
scripts.test:e2e:crossnode: docker compose -f docker-compose.crossnode.yml up --build --abort-on-container-exit; docker compose -f docker-compose.crossnode.yml down -v
scripts.test:standalone: docker compose -f docker-compose.standalone.yml up --build --abort-on-container-exit; docker compose -f docker-compose.standalone.yml down -v
